meanings.definition: a type of antelope found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The boshboks grazed peacefully in the grassy savannah.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of boshboks while on safari in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The boshboks decided to have a race to see who was the fastest antelope.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as a boshboks leaping through the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The boshboks' distinctive horns make them easy to spot in the wild.

meanings.sent1: The boshboks were a magnificent sight as they roamed the plains.
meanings.sent2: We counted ten boshboks in the herd.
meanings.sent3: The boshboks gathered together for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The boshboks' unity was as strong as their horns.
meanings.sent5: The boshboks' presence added beauty to the landscape.
